# Lebanese Driving License Practice Application

> A free, open-source web application for practicing the Lebanese driving license QCM (multiple-choice) exam.

## About

This application helps people prepare for the official Lebanese driving license examination. All questions and answers are in Arabic, matching the real exam format. The user interface is in English.

## Features

- **Practice Mode**: Answer QCM questions with instant feedback showing correct/incorrect answers
- **Mock Exam Mode**: Timed exams simulating real test conditions (configurable question count and timer)
- **Road Sign Flashcards**: Browse traffic signs with their Arabic names
- **Road Sign Quiz**: Test your knowledge of Lebanese road signs
- **Story Mode**: Progressive difficulty levels — score 70%+ to unlock the next level
- **Bookmarks**: Save difficult questions for later review
- **Question Review**: Edit and review the question bank

## Content Coverage

- Traffic laws and regulations specific to Lebanon
- Road signs: warning, regulatory, informational, and directional
- Right of way rules
- Vehicle safety and maintenance
- General driving knowledge and best practices

## Technical Details

- Built with React 18 and TypeScript
- Vite build system
- Client-side only — no server required
- Data stored in browser localStorage
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Works offline after initial load

## URLs

- Home: /
- Practice Quiz: /quiz/practice
- Exam Quiz: /quiz/exam
- Road Sign Flashcards: /signs/flashcards
- Road Sign Quiz: /signs/quiz
- Story Mode: /story
- Bookmarks: /bookmarks
- Results: /results
